name: Boomsheep
description:
This game is about Ribilla, a shepherd dog which has to look after the farm while the owner is away for some days.

Ribilla is a very smart and experienced shepherd but sheeps in this farm are quite particular: Ribi will take really care of them and look after their every need, or... boom!

Guide Ribilla in this insane adventure!

Commands:

Left click to move Ribilla in the yard.

Select the bark (click in the icon in the bottom right corner or press 1, 2 or 3) appropriate for your situations.

Use selected bark by holding the right mouse button to position it and then release the button to fire it.

When moving you will push away sheeps close to you.

Shear them when their hair grow.

Wash them when they get dirty.

Leave them alone when you bark too much at them.

Endure 7 days and try to keep as many sheeps as possible alive.

Be a good girl.
